author: Paul Farhi
title: Chanel Rion of OANN returns to White House briefing in defiance of correspondents’ association — and at the White House’s invitation - The Washington Post
description: Chanel Rion of OANN returns to White House briefing in defiance of correspondents’ association — and at the White House’s invitation The Washington Post Reporter from pro-Trump channel attends White House coronavirus briefing, defying press corps POLITICO OAN…
content: Rion said Grisham had signed off on her presence, despite a strict seat rotation established during the coronavirus crisis to thin the usual crowd and keep reporters and officials including Trump and Vice President Mike Pence at a safe distance from one anoth… [+3066 chars]
